review: One of the best items I ever purchased. Cable TV costs are out of control and I found we watched more Netflix anyway but we only had 1 Apple TV device. I ordered one of these for my room and canceled Cable altogether(saving me over $100 per month!). Loooove all of the HBO shows I can stream...loved it so much I ordered one for my daughters room. This is so easy to install and about 1/3 the cost of the apple tv device. Buy it! You wont be sorry!
